name: helmjs
description: Minimal hypermedia library for HTML-first web applications

scripts.build: esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --minify --format=esm --banner:js="// HelmJS v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") - https://github.com/Letdown2491/helmjs" --outfile=dist/helm.js && tsc --emitDeclarationOnly
scripts.size: esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --minify --format=esm --outfile=dist/helm.js && wc -c dist/helm.js && gzip -c dist/helm.js | wc -c
